title: Apple seeds macOS 12.3 RC with Universal Control, new emoji, Siri voice, and more
content:
Just after its “Peek performance” March event, Apple has launched the macOS 12.3 RC. The software includes the anticipated Universal Control, all-new emoji, new Siri voice, and more.

more…

The post Apple seeds macOS 12.3 RC with Universal Control, new emoji, Siri voice, and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has officially seeded the macOS 12.3 RC to developers that comes with the anticipated Universal Control feature and more.
